div.h2: Argonaut Data Query Implemenation Guide Client
div.p: This Conformance instance defines the expected capabilities of a client when conforming to the Argonaut Data Query Implementation Guide.

The Argonaut Data Query Client SHOULD support querying of one or more FHIR resources using appropriate Argonaut Provider Directory profile(s), RESTful operations defined for the profile and Search parameters identified for the profile

The Argonaut Data Query Client SHOULD support querying of one or more FHIR resources using appropriate Argonaut Data Query profile(s), RESTful operations defined for the profile and Search parameters identified for the profile.

a.title: Allows discovery of existing Argonaut Data Query patient resources using different search criteria
Allows retrieval of a specific Argonaut Data Query patients by id
Allows retrieval of a historical version of a Argonaut Data Query patient instance
Allows review of changes to Argonaut Data Query patient instance over time
